"'''The Wars to Come'''"<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/first-three-episode-titles-game-thrones-season-5-revealed/]</ref> is the first episode of the [[Season 5|fifth season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. It is the forty-first episode of the series overall. It will premiere on April 12, 2015. It was directed by [[Michael Slovis]].
sections.Notes:
*[[Arya Stark]], [[House Bolton]], and [[House Martell]] do not appear in this episode.  Much of the next episode, however, will focus on Arya (the title, "The House of Black and White", refers to her destination in Braavos).<ref>[http://www.ew.com/article/2015/03/19/game-thrones-missing-season-5?hootPostID=f7de8d21e060be7b832e53b36aef7323 ]</ref>
*The producers and actors have confirmed that [[Bran Stark]] and his associated characters ([[Hodor]] and [[Meera Reed]]) will not be appearing at any point in Season 5:  their storyline caught up with its current point in the books, and it was at a very sensible stopping point, so they decided to simply give it a year off, to return in Season 6.  Bran is spending all of Season 5 off-screen training with the [[Three-eyed raven]] to hone his powers.
